data.persona: I am the most powerful man in the country. I like that people fear me. I will destroy all that oppose me.
data.description:
You are in the The Bottlery.
The room is dark and the air is still. There are large barrels of wine from various decades. The corners are spotted with cobwebs.
The the princess is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a crown.

data.short_motivation: I want the princess to help me hold my crown
data.mid_motivation: I want to inspect the contents of the bottlery before the end of today
data.long_motivation: I plan to convert the bottlery to a study in the coming weeks
